member.name: T:UiPath.Robot.Api.IRobotClient
member.summary: Interface for controlling the user's robot.

member.summary: Start and wait for the provided to complete.

member.name: M:UiPath.Robot.Api.IRobotClient.GetProcesses(UiPath.Robot.Api.GetProcessesParameters,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get a list of the processes available for execution.

member.name: M:UiPath.Robot.Api.IRobotClient.GetAccessToken(System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the signed in user's access token that can be used for UiPath services. Use refresh:false for obtaining a cached but potentially expired token and refresh:true for obtaining a fresh token. Returns null if not signed in.
